Progress will discontinue Telerik Platform on May 10th, 2018. Learn more

AppBuilder

Usage Synopsis
General $ appbuilder <Command> [Parameters] [--options <Values>]

General Commands

Command Description
help <Command> Shows additional information about the commands in this list in the browser.
login Logs you in the Progress Telerik Platform.
logout Logs you out from the Progress Telerik Platform.
user Prints information about the currently logged in user.
usage-reporting Configures anonymous usage reporting.
error-reporting Configures anonymous error reporting.
autocomplete Manages your command-line completion settings.
doctor Checks your system for configuration problems which might prevent the AppBuilder CLI from working properly.
proxy Displays proxy settings.

Project Development Commands

Command Description
create <Type> Creates a new project from template.
sample Lists sample apps.
sample clone Clones a selected sample app.
export Exports a cloud-based project from a selected solution to facilitate the migration to a different framework.
init Initializes an existing project for development.
cloud Lists all solutions and projects associated with your Progress Telerik Platform account.
cloud export Exports one or all projects from a selected solution from the cloud.
build <Platform> Builds the project for a selected target platform and downloads the application package or produces a QR code for deploying the application package.
deploy <Platform> Builds and deploys the project to a connected device.
livesync cloud Synchronizes the project with the cloud to enable LiveSync for remote devices.
livesync <Platform> Synchronizes the latest changes in your project to connected devices.
debug <Platform> Shows the debug tools to let you debug applications on connected devices.
simulate Runs the current project in the device simulator.
emulate <Platform> Runs the current project in the selected platform emulator.
remote Starts a remote server to let you run your app in the iOS Simulator from a Windows system.
edit-configuration Opens a configuration file for editing.
prop print Prints the current project configuration or the value for the selected project property.
prop add Enables more options for the selected project property, if the property accepts multiple values.
prop set Sets the selected project property and overwrites its current value.
prop remove Disables options for the selected project property, if the property accepts multiple values.
mobileframework Lists all supported versions of the current development framework.
mobileframework set Sets the selected development framework version for the project.
webview Lists the available web views for iOS and Android.
webview set Sets the selected web view for the current project.
kendoui Lists the available Kendo UI Core or Kendo UI Professional packages that you can add to your project.
kendoui install Updates or adds Kendo UI Code or Kendo UI Professional to your project.
kendoui notes Shows release notes for the available Kendo UI Core and Kendo UI Professional packages.
resource Lists information about the image resources for all mobile platforms.
resource create Creates image resources for all mobile platforms from a single high-resolution image.

Screen Builder Development Commands


These commands are deprecated and will be removed in the next official release.

Command Description
create screenbuilder Creates a new project for hybrid development with Screen Builder.
screenbuilder Shows all commands for project development with Screen Builder.
upgrade-screenbuilder Upgrades a project to the latest Screen Builder version.
add-view Adds a new application view to your project.
add-dataprovider Connects your project to a data provider.
add-authentication Inserts sign-in and sign-up forms in an existing application view.
add-about Inserts a new about form in an existing application view.
add-list Inserts a new list in an existing application view.
add-form Inserts a new form in an existing application view.
add-field Inserts a new input field in an existing form.

Apache Cordova Plugin and NativeScript Module Management Commands

Command Description
plugin Lists all Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules that are currently enabled for your project.
plugin add Enables a Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules for your project.
plugin configure Configures plugin variables for selected core, integrated or verified Apache Cordova plugins.
plugin remove Disables Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules from your project.
plugin find Searches by one or more keywords for Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules.
plugin fetch Imports the selected Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules into your project.

Device Commands

Command Description
device Lists all recognized connected devices.
device log Opens the log stream for the selected device.
device list-applications Lists the installed applications on all connected devices.
device run Runs the selected already installed application on a connected device.

Certificate Management and Publishing Commands

Command Description
certificate-request Lists all pending certificate signing requests (CSR).
certificate-request create Creates a certificate signing request (CSR) which you can upload in the iOS Dev Center.
certificate-request remove Removes a pending certificate signing request (CSR).
certificate-request download Downloads a pending certificate signing request (CSR) which you can upload in the iOS Dev Center.
certificate Lists all configured certificates for code signing iOS and Android applications.
certificate create-self-signed Creates self-signed certificate for code signing Android applications.
certificate remove Removes the selected certificate from the server.
certificate export Exports the selected certificate from the server on your file system.
certificate import Imports a P12 or a CER file from your file system to the server.
provision Lists all configured provisioning profiles for code signing iOS applications.
provision import Imports a provisioning profile from file.
provision remove Removes a registered provisioning profile.
appstore list Lists all applications in iTunes Connect.
appstore upload Builds the project and uploads the binary to iTunes Connect.
appmanager groups Lists the distribution groups configured in your Progress Telerik AppManager portal.
appmanager upload <Platform> Builds the project and uploads the binary to Progress Telerik AppManager.
appmanager livesync <Platforms> Publishes a new Telerik AppManager LiveSync update of your published app.

Global Options

Option Description
--help, -h, /? Prints help about the selected command in the console.
--path <Directory> Specifies the directory that contains the project. If not set, the project is searched for in the current directory and all directories above it.
--version Prints the client version.
--log trace Prints a detailed diagnostic log for the execution of the current command.
